Merge pull request #43 from fzipi/patch-1

Update README.md

Update README.md

Added documentation for directory where certificates are stored.
Add ability to approve domains with a function

Merge pull request #39 from jefftham/patch-1

Update README.md

Update README.md

'which node'  may return symlink,  `readlink -f \`which node\``  may be more reliable.

Merge pull request #31 from rcpeters/master

Add in fallback to process.env.USERPROFILE for window users
add in failback to process.env.USERPROFILE for window users

Merge pull request #27 from rcpeters/master

Add section about where certs are stored
add section about where certs are stored

Merge pull request #25 from hairyhenderson/patch-1

Updating LetsEncrypt rate limits URL

Updating LetsEncrypt rate limits URL

From the current URL:

> This page has moved (as of July 2016) to https://letsencrypt.org/docs/rate-limits/
Lock letsencrypt version, update some deps

Merge pull request #22 from JorgeAguirreLeon/redirect-code

Redirect code
Update deps and switch from node-static to serve-static.

Merge pull request #18 from salehhamadeh/master

Fix restify code in README.
Fix regression that caused infinite loop
Fix issue with certificate not resetting when options change. Potentially fix a restify issue.
Update docs, remove bundle option and fuzzy domain matching. Domains option is now required
Return original restify server when restify is used.
Add actual test for LE (staging) registration with ngrok
Add potential fix for restify servers

Merge pull request #9 from yenbekbay/master

Check if a request includes the Host header before forcing SSL

Check if a request includes the Host header before forsing SSL

The missing Host header causes a crash when trying to call split on it.
Use bluebird for promises for legacy node support
Add email to self signed certs
Make bundles CN always be the bundle name
Fix error messages for agreeTos and email
Fix issue with some methods being passed to secure server with forceSSL enabled. Make requests passed to secure server more consistent
Fix regression that stopped certs renewing
Resolve linting issue with updated standardjs
Fixed issue with servers not directly passing in a handler with forceSSL as false. Add some basic tests.
Make dbug mode use staging acme server and update some function names.
Cleanup .gitignore. Add snazzy reporting. Remove gulp/mocha until used.

Merge pull request #3 from martinheidegger/feature/standard

Linting: Standard

Merge pull request #1 from pra85/patch-1

Fix typo in Readme.md

Merge pull request #2 from jozsefs/master

fix code example in README
Made sure that standard-format is being upheld by current code.

Fix typo in Readme.md

Spelling mistake - `incomming` > `incoming`
No longer returns a promise (fixes issues with clusters). Added ability to override http(s) modules. Made handler optional
Add ability to disable http->https redirects and add gitter badge.
Misc cleanup and fix issue with non-standard http port
Send chain instead of just cert
Add a few keywords to package.json
Remove subject options since LE does not support them
Add ability to specify subject for certificates
Add ability to restrict domain list. Fix issue with redirecting to wrong port with custom http(s) ports
Now resolves createServer after both servers are listening.
Now creates two servers instead of using http both.
Check for expired certs before expiring the cert
Clean up and add some docs
